# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #161](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#161)

#### [PhantineÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fpctv)

Would it have been theoretically possible to create thinking life by adding excess Ruin instead of excess Preservation?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
